description: This file provides type definitions for the 'nanoid' library, including functions and constants for generating secure, URL-friendly unique IDs with various customization options.

methods.name: export function nanoid(size?: number): string nanoid
methods.description: Generates a secure URL-friendly unique ID with optional size parameter.

methods.name: customAlphabet
methods.description: Creates a custom ID generator function using a specified alphabet and optional default size.

methods.name: customRandom
methods.description: Creates a custom random ID generator with specified alphabet, size, and random byte generator.

methods.name: random
methods.description: Generates an array of random bytes from hardware noise.
